company.name: Cloudjet Solutions
company.description:
CJS commits to build simple & useful enterprise softwares to help build the best Asia Enterprises by simplifying, systemising the best management practices into software products. 

By that, we contribute to:

- Help build strong national economy through strong enterprises
- Create more jobs
- Bring happiness and productiveness to everybody 

Two main products:
Cloudjet KPI - Performance and Talent Management
Cloudjet Pipeline - Sales Management & Optimization
